title: Bai Bian Xiao Ba
synopsis: In Yongsheng Town, there is an artificial intelligence school bus dedicated to Sunshine Forest Kindergarten. He is witty, brave and full of wisdom. He is not only a hero in the hearts of children, but also an indispensable mentor and friend of children. He is the school bus Goethe. Whenever the children encounter difficulties, Goethe's school bus immediately transforms into a fire truck, a police car, an ambulance, a rescue boat, and an airplane to rush to use various interesting props to resolve the crisis and answer the children's questions. (translated from iqiyi)
